category.name: Product Structure.Product Structure Synchronization
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_BVRSYNCFORM_DELEGATE
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the BVRSYNCFORM named reference inherits delegated write access from the UGMASTER dataset. Valid Values: true - The BVRSYNCFORM named reference inherits the write access privilege from the UGMASTER dataset. false - The BVRSYNCFORM named reference does not inherit the write access privilege from the UGMASTER dataset.
